member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.runGame
member.summary: Runs main game loop and displays a message based on final game state

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.runMovingPhase(MorabarabaGame.Board,MorabarabaGame.Player,System.Tuple{System.Char,System.Int32},System.Tuple{System.Char,System.Int32},System.Tuple{System.Char,System.Int32},System.Tuple{System.Char,System.Int32},System.Int32)
member.summary: Executes the entire moving phase for Morabaraba
member.param: Board record holding the boardState and player stones
Last full move for player X (piece selected and where it was moved to)
Last full move for player O (piece selected and where it was moved to)
Draw counter that is incremented when both players have 3 stones, game is drawn when counter reaches 10
member.returns: GameState once all play has been concluded

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.changeAlltoFlying(MorabarabaGame.Board,MorabarabaGame.Player)
member.summary: Changes all the pieces of the provided player form Normal of Player to Flying of Player, this happens when the player reaches 3 Cows on board
member.param: The player whose cows must be changed

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.canPlay(Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList{MorabarabaGame.Cell},MorabarabaGame.Player)
member.summary: Checks whether the provided player can make a move

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.movePiece(MorabarabaGame.Board,MorabarabaGame.Player)
member.summary: Selects a piece to move, gets recursively called until valid input is given then calls either doNormalMove or doFlyingMove based on the piece chosen

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.doNormalMove(MorabarabaGame.Board,Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList{MorabarabaGame.Cell},MorabarabaGame.Player,System.Char,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the chosen Normal cow to an adjacent Empty square (neighbour)
member.param: A Cell list of adjacent squares
The position from which the piece was taken

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.doFlyingMove(MorabarabaGame.Board,MorabarabaGame.Player,System.Char,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves the chosen Flying cow to an Empty square
member.param: The position from which the piece was taken

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.getNeighbourCells(Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList{MorabarabaGame.Cell},System.Char,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all cell's neighbour states
member.param: The position of the cell being checked

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.getAdjacentSquares(System.Char,System.Int32)
member.summary: Takes a position and returns the positions of the adjacent squares

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.runPlacingPhase(MorabarabaGame.Board,MorabarabaGame.Player)
member.summary: Executes the entire placing phase for Morabaraba

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.placePiece(MorabarabaGame.Board,MorabarabaGame.Player)
member.summary: Places one of the player's stones onto the board as a Cow of Normal Player

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.shootCow(MorabarabaGame.Board,MorabarabaGame.Player)
member.summary: After player has completed a mill, this checks that an opponent's cow can be shot and if so replaces the chosen Cow with Empty

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.isInMill(Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList{MorabarabaGame.Cell},System.Char,System.Int32)
member.summary: Checks if the Cell with pos=playPos is in a mill

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.updateSquare(MorabarabaGame.Board,System.Char,System.Int32,MorabarabaGame.Cow)
member.summary: Updates Cell with pos=pos to have state = newState

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.getStateFromPos(Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList{MorabarabaGame.Cell},System.Char,System.Int32)
member.summary: Takes position pos and returns the state of Cell with pos=pos in board

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.getCellFromPos(Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList{MorabarabaGame.Cell},System.Char,System.Int32)
member.summary: Takes position pos and returns the Cell with pos=pos in board

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.getPosFromUser(System.String,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpFunc{Microsoft.FSharp.Core.Unit,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.Unit})
member.summary: Gets a position of type char*int from the user. The function is recursively called until valid input is given

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.isValidPos(System.Char,System.Int32)
member.summary: Takes a position and returns whether or not it matches the valid positions for the standard Morabaraba board

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.getEmptySquares(Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList{MorabarabaGame.Cell})
member.summary: returns all empty squares present in board

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.getNumPlayerSquares(Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList{MorabarabaGame.Cell},MorabarabaGame.Player)
member.summary: returns the number of squares player has on board

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.getPlayerSquares(Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList{MorabarabaGame.Cell},MorabarabaGame.Player)
member.summary: returns the Cells that belong to player on board

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.getOpponent(MorabarabaGame.Player)
member.summary: gets the player that is not player

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.genericErrorMsg(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: displays an error message with an optional prompt before continuing with execution

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.refreshBoard(MorabarabaGame.Board,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.Unit)
member.summary: clears the console and displays the board and player stones

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.displayScore(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: displays the stones for each player

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.displayBoard(System.String)
member.summary: takes string representation of the board and displays it

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.boardToString(Microsoft.FSharp.Collections.FSharpList{MorabarabaGame.Cell})
member.summary: converts the board into a string for consistent iteraction between backend and UI

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.playerToString(MorabarabaGame.Player)
member.summary: gets string representation of player

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.printPiece(System.Char)
member.summary: Prints a piece in a certain colour depending on what it is

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.cprintfn(System.ConsoleColor,System.String)
member.summary: Print msg ending in a newline to the console with color

member.name: M:MorabarabaGame.cprintf(System.ConsoleColor,System.String)
member.summary: Print msg to the console with color
